contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription:
Kentico MVP, Elmar Höfinghoff, leverages his seasoned experience with Kentico and takes a deep gaze back in time, reviewing the UI, feature, and strategic changes in Kentico's CMS and DXP products over 20 years. He ends at a new beginning - the future with Xperience by Kentico.
(German language, use your browser to translate!)
